channel.title: ErasedPkz webclient
channel.description:
Hello, I know how to make PI and Delta webclient but I'm trying to make an ErasedPkz one currently but every way i know of and can find on the internet doesn't work. I can make the .jar perfectly fine using JAR Maker but when i upload the client.jar to my webhost and try to play the webclient it shows a white screen that says Error. Click for details in the top left corner of the white screen. Please help, Im using the ErasedPkz Client V2. You can add me on msn: derosha22@yahoo.com or skype: derosha22.
-Thanks, Danny

item.title: ErasedPkz webclient
item.dc:creator: @jiji jiji
item.description:
@jiji wrote:

[quote=“A New LIght, post:8, topic:420095”][quote author=I96 link=topic=522654.msg3802138#msg3802138 date=1320108587]
I don’t understand
[/quote]Um…okay…

go to your control panel -> uninstall a program

Now uninstall EVERYTHING related to java. so java jdk and java jre.

Now go and redownload java jdk 7 and java jre 7.

Then you need to COMPILE first then RUN your client. Then you can make a webclient etc. :)[/quote]

+1 then smoke some weed and listen to dubstep

Read full topic

item.title: ErasedPkz webclient
item.dc:creator: @A_New_LIght A New LIght
item.description:
@A_New_LIght wrote:

[quote=“I96, post:7, topic:420095”]I don’t understand[/quote]Um…okay…

go to your control panel -> uninstall a program

Now uninstall EVERYTHING related to java. so java jdk and java jre.

Now go and redownload java jdk 7 and java jre 7.

Then you need to COMPILE first then RUN your client. Then you can make a webclient etc.

Read full topic

item.title: ErasedPkz webclient
item.dc:creator: @A_New_LIght A New LIght
item.description:
@A_New_LIght wrote:

What it means is that you compiled your classes under one jdk/jre version. Then you tried to run it with an OLDER run.

You should get the same jdk/jre version for the run and compiler and re-compile/run/reupload.

Read full topic

item.title: ErasedPkz webclient

item.description:
@A_New_LIght wrote:

You need to double click on the error red thingy on the left so we can get the full error.
